overview: my English name is Helen,33 years old, since 2003 i got my English tour guide certificate, i make living on guiding, i love my job very well, and have a lots of friends, allover the world, my characteristic is very good, crazy like to talk and humor, and responsibility , friendly, …etc. i try my best to let’s the guests feel worth to come to see the Terra-Cotta warriors and horses museum,i am full of history, sense of art, and communicated very nice and well with all the guests from allover the world. very experienced and expert of Xi’an, also been work as a national tour escort as well.be with Helen, WILL BE FULL OF JOY AND NO WORRY , TRAVEL around CHINA. let’s go……let’s get to know china, let’s got to know china.
